Key Match Events: Denver Nuggets cruised to a 126-103 victory over the Kawhi Leonard-less LA Clippers
Jamal Murray took charge with 21 points and nine assists
Russell Westbrook contributed 19 points, eight assists and six rebounds
Michael Porter Jr. had 19 points and eight rebounds
DeAndre Jordan posted 12 points and nine rebounds
Julian Strawther and Christian Braun added 16 and 15 points, respectively
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets shot a strong 48.6% from 3-point range (17-of-35) and 55.1% overall
The Clippers were led by Norman Powellâ€™s 30 points but shot just 37.5% overall, including 28.9% from deep
James Harden struggled, finishing 5-of-15 for 16 points
Others: The game was played on January 8, 2025
The game was played at Ball Arena
The Nuggets had six players score in double figures during the dominant performance
The Nuggets had a 29-14 advantage in assists
